java.nio

Class Bits

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.nio.Bits

  •  class Bits
extends Object
    Access to bits, native and otherwise.

      • copyFromArray

        static void copyFromArray(Object src,
                 long srcBaseOffset,
                 long srcPos,
                 long dstAddr,
                 long length)
        Copy from given source array to destination address.
        Parameters:
        src - source array
        srcBaseOffset - offset of first element of storage in source array
        srcPos - offset within source array of the first element to read
        dstAddr - destination address
        length - number of bytes to copy

      • copyToArray

        static void copyToArray(long srcAddr,
               Object dst,
               long dstBaseOffset,
               long dstPos,
               long length)
        Copy from source address into given destination array.
        Parameters:
        srcAddr - source address
        dst - destination array
        dstBaseOffset - offset of first element of storage in destination array
        dstPos - offset within destination array of the first element to write
        length - number of bytes to copy
